Item 1
Youth Sports Teams Daytona Beach
Sports Team Welcome
There’s no question that Florida is a sports haven and Perry's Ocean Edge Resort puts you within it all. Ideally located near Embry Riddle University and Daytona State College, as well as other popular youth sports venues, we make it easy for sports travel teams to keep their eyes on the prize.
Previous
Next
Item 1
Item 2
Enjoy our newly refreshed rooms featuring modern style as well as a free complimentary breakfast, including our renowned freshly made donuts. If you’re bringing the entire squad ask us about discounted room blocks (for 8 rooms or more).
Start Planning
Sports Teams Amenities
Special group rates on room blocks
Rooms that can sleep up to 6 - two queens w/pull out
Rooms that connect - for a shared large kitchen
Express check-in with pre-registration
Meeting room for team gatherings
Homemade Doughnuts, oatmeal and juice in the morning complimentary
Meeting space for up to 50 guests
Offsite catering allowed
Rooms that can sleep up to 6 - two queens w/pull out
Three pools on property and a large beachfront to practice on
Free parking for bus
Indoor and outdoor swimming pools
BBQ grills

Previous
Next
Item 1
Groups & Events Daytona Beach
Our Group Welcomes Yours
Daytona Beach is a popular group and event destination and it’s no surprise why. Experience the great weather and the great beaches at Perry's Ocean Edge Resort. Situated along the Atlantic Ocean, we’re the perfect beachfront resort for your next gathering or special event. Newly refreshed, we’re a family-friendly resort that offers homemade fresh donuts, a year-round activities program, and fun activities like shuffleboard, a swimming pool, BBQ grills and a putting green.
Previous
Next
Item 1
Item 2
Group Retreats in Daytona Beach
Group Retreats in Daytona Beach
Let us make your group trip fun and carefree. Our team of experts will help make sure you have an authentic Daytona Beach experience, including setting up room blocks (for 10 or more rooms), express check-in, to exclusive discount pricing at nearby attractions and golf courses. Whether your a church group, travel group, sports group, or a tour group, Perry's Ocean Edge Resort is the best choice.
Start Planning
Previous
Next
Item 1
Item 2
Item 3
Item 4
Beachside Social Gatherings
Everything is better by the beach and that’s definitely true of social gatherings or celebrations. Enjoy our stunning oceanfront location with breathtaking views of the Atlantic and our newly refreshed accommodations featuring modern style. Whether you are planning a reunion, a birthday party, an anniversary celebration, we invite you to make Perry's Ocean Edge Resort your home base. Conveniently located near Embry Riddle University and Daytona State College, we’re also the perfect choice for Daytona Beach graduations.
Start Planning
Previous
Next
Item 1
Business Events by the Beach
Business Events by the Beach
When you’re planning a business event unlike any other, Perry's Ocean Edge Resort is for you. We specialize in corporate gatherings that require a casual, vibrant atmosphere and warm, dedicated service. Our staff will help plan your corporate groups time in Daytona Beach with golf tee time reservations, custom rooms blocks for 8 or more rooms, and discounts on local area attractions.
Start Planning
Group & Event Amenities
Special group rates on room blocks
Express check-in with pre-registration
Kitchenettes in all room types
Homemade donuts, juice and coffee
Meeting space for up to 50 guests
Offsite catering allowed
Discount pricing at area golf courses
Discount pricing for area activities
Indoor and outdoor swimming pools
START PLANNING
